comments.body: please check the transitive dependencies. IMO we should strip all 'exotic' and rarely used dependencies.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Upgraded to 1.0 and adjusted the exclusion rules form JCR-2885 accordingly. With these exclusions we still keep the following dependencies:

    PDF: pdfbox, fontbox, jempbox, bcmail, bcprov 
    MS Office: poi, poi-ooxml, poi-ooxml-schemas, poi-scratchpad, commons-codec, xmlbeans, dom4j, geronimo-stax-api
    HTML: tagsoup 

Basic formats like plain text, XML and RTF (plus rudimentary support for OpenOffice) are handled with the standard Java class library.

description: Tika 1.0 was released today and has many improvements over the earlier 0.10 release. We should upgrade.
